00049 
00050 void osd_brw_stats_update(struct osd_device *osd, struct osd_iobuf *iobuf)
00051 {
00052         struct brw_stats *s = &osd->od_brw_stats;
00053         sector_t         *last_block = NULL;
00054         struct page     **pages = iobuf->dr_pages;
00055         struct page      *last_page = NULL;
00056         unsigned long     discont_pages = 0;
00057         unsigned long     discont_blocks = 0;
00058         sector_t         *blocks = iobuf->dr_blocks;
00059         int               i, nr_pages = iobuf->dr_npages;
00060         int               blocks_per_page;
00061         int               rw = iobuf->dr_rw;
00062 
00063         if (unlikely(nr_pages == 0))
00064                 return;
00065 
00066         blocks_per_page = PAGE_CACHE_SIZE >> osd_sb(osd)->s_blocksize_bits;
00067 
00068         lprocfs_oh_tally_log2(&s->hist[BRW_R_PAGES+rw], nr_pages);
00069 
00070         while (nr_pages-- > 0) {
00071                 if (last_page && (*pages)->index != (last_page->index + 1))
00072                         discont_pages++;
00073                 last_page = *pages;
00074                 pages++;
00075                 for (i = 0; i < blocks_per_page; i++) {
00076                         if (last_block && *blocks != (*last_block + 1))
00077                                 discont_blocks++;
00078                         last_block = blocks++;
00079                 }
00080         }
00081 
00082         lprocfs_oh_tally(&s->hist[BRW_R_DISCONT_PAGES+rw], discont_pages);
00083         lprocfs_oh_tally(&s->hist[BRW_R_DISCONT_BLOCKS+rw], discont_blocks);
00084 }
00085 
00086 #define pct(a, b) (b ? a * 100 / b : 0)
00087 
00088 static void display_brw_stats(struct seq_file *seq, char *name, char *units,
00089         struct obd_histogram *read, struct obd_histogram *write, int scale)
00090 {
00091         unsigned long read_tot, write_tot, r, w, read_cum = 0, write_cum = 0;
00092         int i;
00093 
00094         seq_printf(seq, "\n%26s read      |     write\n", " ");
00095         seq_printf(seq, "%-22s %-5s %% cum %% |  %-11s %% cum %%\n",
00096                    name, units, units);
00097 
00098         read_tot = lprocfs_oh_sum(read);
00099         write_tot = lprocfs_oh_sum(write);
00100         for (i = 0; i < OBD_HIST_MAX; i++) {
00101                 r = read->oh_buckets[i];
00102                 w = write->oh_buckets[i];
00103                 read_cum += r;
00104                 write_cum += w;
00105                 if (read_cum == 0 && write_cum == 0)
00106                         continue;
00107 
00108                 if (!scale)
00109                         seq_printf(seq, "%u", i);
00110                 else if (i < 10)
00111                         seq_printf(seq, "%u", scale << i);
00112                 else if (i < 20)
00113                         seq_printf(seq, "%uK", scale << (i-10));
00114                 else
00115                         seq_printf(seq, "%uM", scale << (i-20));
00116 
00117                 seq_printf(seq, ":\t\t%10lu %3lu %3lu   | %4lu %3lu %3lu\n",
00118                            r, pct(r, read_tot), pct(read_cum, read_tot),
00119                            w, pct(w, write_tot), pct(write_cum, write_tot));
00120 
00121                 if (read_cum == read_tot && write_cum == write_tot)
00122                         break;
00123         }
00124 }
00125 
00126 static void brw_stats_show(struct seq_file *seq, struct brw_stats *brw_stats)
00127 {
00128         struct timeval now;
00129 
00130         /* this sampling races with updates */
00131         do_gettimeofday(&now);
00132         seq_printf(seq, "snapshot_time:         %lu.%lu (secs.usecs)\n",
00133                    now.tv_sec, now.tv_usec);
00134 
00135         display_brw_stats(seq, "pages per bulk r/w", "rpcs",
00136                           &brw_stats->hist[BRW_R_PAGES],
00137                           &brw_stats->hist[BRW_W_PAGES], 1);
00138 
00139         display_brw_stats(seq, "discontiguous pages", "rpcs",
00140                           &brw_stats->hist[BRW_R_DISCONT_PAGES],
00141                           &brw_stats->hist[BRW_W_DISCONT_PAGES], 0);
00142 
00143         display_brw_stats(seq, "discontiguous blocks", "rpcs",
00144                           &brw_stats->hist[BRW_R_DISCONT_BLOCKS],
00145                           &brw_stats->hist[BRW_W_DISCONT_BLOCKS], 0);
00146 
00147         display_brw_stats(seq, "disk fragmented I/Os", "ios",
00148                           &brw_stats->hist[BRW_R_DIO_FRAGS],
00149                           &brw_stats->hist[BRW_W_DIO_FRAGS], 0);
00150 
00151         display_brw_stats(seq, "disk I/Os in flight", "ios",
00152                           &brw_stats->hist[BRW_R_RPC_HIST],
00153                           &brw_stats->hist[BRW_W_RPC_HIST], 0);
00154 
00155         display_brw_stats(seq, "I/O time (1/1000s)", "ios",
00156                           &brw_stats->hist[BRW_R_IO_TIME],
00157                           &brw_stats->hist[BRW_W_IO_TIME],
00158                           jiffies_to_msecs(1000) / MSEC_PER_SEC);
00159 
00160         display_brw_stats(seq, "disk I/O size", "ios",
00161                           &brw_stats->hist[BRW_R_DISK_IOSIZE],
00162                           &brw_stats->hist[BRW_W_DISK_IOSIZE], 1);
00163 }
00164 
00165 #undef pct

00167 static int osd_brw_stats_seq_show(struct seq_file *seq, void *v)
00168 {
00169         struct osd_device *osd = seq->private;
00170 
00171         brw_stats_show(seq, &osd->od_brw_stats);
00172 
00173         return 0;
00174 }
00175 
00176 static ssize_t osd_brw_stats_seq_write(struct file *file, const char *buf,
00177                                        size_t len, loff_t *off)
00178 {
00179         struct seq_file *seq = file->private_data;
00180         struct osd_device *osd = seq->private;
00181         int i;
00182 
00183         for (i = 0; i < BRW_LAST; i++)
00184                 lprocfs_oh_clear(&osd->od_brw_stats.hist[i]);
00185 
00186         return len;
00187 }
00188 
00189 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(osd_brw_stats);
00190 
00191 static int osd_stats_init(struct osd_device *osd)
00192 {
00193         int i, result;
00194         ENTRY;
00195 
00196         for (i = 0; i < BRW_LAST; i++)
00197                 spin_lock_init(&osd->od_brw_stats.hist[i].oh_lock);
00198 
00199         osd->od_stats = lprocfs_alloc_stats(LPROC_OSD_LAST, 0);
00200         if (osd->od_stats != NULL) {
00201                 result = lprocfs_register_stats(osd->od_proc_entry, "stats",
00202                                                 osd->od_stats);
00203                 if (result)
00204                         GOTO(out, result);
00205 
00206                 lprocfs_counter_init(osd->od_stats, LPROC_OSD_GET_PAGE,
00207                                      LPROCFS_CNTR_AVGMINMAX|LPROCFS_CNTR_STDDEV,
00208                                      "get_page", "usec");
00209                 lprocfs_counter_init(osd->od_stats, LPROC_OSD_NO_PAGE,
00210                                      LPROCFS_CNTR_AVGMINMAX,
00211                                      "get_page_failures", "num");
00212                 lprocfs_counter_init(osd->od_stats, LPROC_OSD_CACHE_ACCESS,
00213                                      LPROCFS_CNTR_AVGMINMAX,
00214                                      "cache_access", "pages");
00215                 lprocfs_counter_init(osd->od_stats, LPROC_OSD_CACHE_HIT,
00216                                      LPROCFS_CNTR_AVGMINMAX,
00217                                      "cache_hit", "pages");
00218                 lprocfs_counter_init(osd->od_stats, LPROC_OSD_CACHE_MISS,
00219                                      LPROCFS_CNTR_AVGMINMAX,
00220                                      "cache_miss", "pages");
00221 #if OSD_THANDLE_STATS
00222                 lprocfs_counter_init(osd->od_stats, LPROC_OSD_THANDLE_STARTING,
00223                                      LPROCFS_CNTR_AVGMINMAX,
00224                                      "thandle starting", "usec");
00225                 lprocfs_counter_init(osd->od_stats, LPROC_OSD_THANDLE_OPEN,
00226                                      LPROCFS_CNTR_AVGMINMAX,
00227                                      "thandle open", "usec");
00228                 lprocfs_counter_init(osd->od_stats, LPROC_OSD_THANDLE_CLOSING,
00229                                      LPROCFS_CNTR_AVGMINMAX,
00230                                      "thandle closing", "usec");
00231 #endif
00232                 result = lprocfs_seq_create(osd->od_proc_entry, "brw_stats",
00233                                             0644, &osd_brw_stats_fops, osd);
00234         } else
00235                 result = -ENOMEM;
00236 
00237 out:
00238         RETURN(result);
00239 }

00242 {
00243         struct osd_device *osd = osd_dt_dev((struct dt_device *)m->private);
00244 
00245         LASSERT(osd != NULL);
00246         seq_puts(m, "ldiskfs\n");
00247         return 0;
00248 }

00276 static ssize_t
00277 ldiskfs_osd_cache_seq_write(struct file *file, const char *buffer,
00278                             size_t count, loff_t *off)
00279 {
00280         struct seq_file *m = file->private_data;
00281         struct dt_device *dt = m->private;
00282         struct osd_device *osd = osd_dt_dev(dt);
00283         int rc;
00284         __s64 val;
00285 
00286         LASSERT(osd != NULL);
00287         if (unlikely(osd->od_mnt == NULL))
00288                 return -EINPROGRESS;
00289 
00290         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00291         if (rc)
00292                 return rc;
00293 
00294         osd->od_read_cache = !!val;
00295         return count;
00296 }
00297 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(ldiskfs_osd_cache);

00334 static ssize_t
00335 lprocfs_osd_force_sync_seq_write(struct file *file, const char *buffer,
00336                                         size_t count, loff_t *off)
00337 {
00338         struct seq_file   *m = file->private_data;
00339         struct dt_device  *dt = m->private;
00340         struct osd_device *osd = osd_dt_dev(dt);
00341         struct lu_env      env;
00342         int                rc;
00343 
00344         LASSERT(osd != NULL);
00345         if (unlikely(osd->od_mnt == NULL))
00346                 return -EINPROGRESS;
00347 
00348         rc = lu_env_init(&env, LCT_LOCAL);
00349         if (rc)
00350                 return rc;
00351         rc = dt_sync(&env, dt);
00352         lu_env_fini(&env);
00353 
00354         return rc == 0 ? count : rc;
00355 }
00356 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_WO_TYPE(ldiskfs, osd_force_sync);

00364 static ssize_t
00365 ldiskfs_osd_pdo_seq_write(struct file *file, const char *buffer,
00366                                 size_t count, loff_t *off)
00367 {
00368         int rc;
00369         __s64 pdo;
00370 
00371         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &pdo);
00372         if (rc != 0)
00373                 return rc;
00374 
00375         ldiskfs_pdo = !!pdo;
00376 
00377         return count;
00378 }
00379 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(ldiskfs_osd_pdo);

00393 static ssize_t
00394 ldiskfs_osd_auto_scrub_seq_write(struct file *file, const char *buffer,
00395                                         size_t count, loff_t *off)
00396 {
00397         struct seq_file *m = file->private_data;

00399         struct osd_device *dev = osd_dt_dev(dt);
00400         int rc;
00401         __s64 val;
00402 
00403         LASSERT(dev != NULL);
00404         if (unlikely(dev->od_mnt == NULL))
00405                 return -EINPROGRESS;
00406 
00407         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00408         if (rc)
00409                 return rc;
00410 
00411         dev->od_noscrub = !val;

00413 }

00428 static ssize_t
00429 ldiskfs_osd_full_scrub_ratio_seq_write(struct file *file, const char *buffer,
00430                                        size_t count, loff_t *off)
00431 {
00432         struct seq_file *m = file->private_data;
00433         struct dt_device *dt = m->private;
00434         struct osd_device *dev = osd_dt_dev(dt);
00435         int rc;
00436         __s64 val;
00437 
00438         LASSERT(dev != NULL);
00439         if (unlikely(dev->od_mnt == NULL))
00440                 return -EINPROGRESS;
00441 
00442         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00443         if (rc != 0)
00444                 return rc;
00445 
00446         if (val < 0)
00447                 return -EINVAL;
00448 
00449         dev->od_full_scrub_ratio = val;
00450         return count;
00451 }
00452 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(ldiskfs_osd_full_scrub_ratio);

00532 static int ldiskfs_osd_readcache_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)

00537         if (unlikely(osd->od_mnt == NULL))

00543 
00544 static ssize_t
00545 ldiskfs_osd_readcache_seq_write(struct file *file, const char *buffer,
00546                                 size_t count, loff_t *off)
00547 {
00548         struct seq_file *m = file->private_data;
00549         struct dt_device *dt = m->private;
00550         struct osd_device *osd = osd_dt_dev(dt);
00551         __s64 val;
00552         int rc;
00553 
00554         LASSERT(osd != NULL);
00555         if (unlikely(osd->od_mnt == NULL))
00556                 return -EINPROGRESS;
00557 
00558         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00559         if (rc)
00560                 return rc;
00561         if (val < 0)
00562                 return -ERANGE;
00563 
00564         osd->od_readcache_max_filesize = val > OSD_MAX_CACHE_SIZE ?
00565                                          OSD_MAX_CACHE_SIZE : val;
00566         return count;
00567 }
00568 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(ldiskfs_osd_readcache);
00569 
00570 #if LUSTRE_VERSION_CODE < OBD_OCD_VERSION(3, 0, 52, 0)
00571 static int ldiskfs_osd_index_in_idif_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
00572 {
00573         struct osd_device *dev = osd_dt_dev((struct dt_device *)m->private);
00574 
00575         LASSERT(dev != NULL);
00576         if (unlikely(dev->od_mnt == NULL))
00577                 return -EINPROGRESS;
00578 
00579         seq_printf(m, "%d\n", (int)(dev->od_index_in_idif));
00580         return 0;
00581 }
00582 
00583 static ssize_t
00584 ldiskfs_osd_index_in_idif_seq_write(struct file *file, const char *buffer,
00585                                     size_t count, loff_t *off)
00586 {
00587         struct lu_env env;
00588         struct seq_file *m = file->private_data;
00589         struct dt_device *dt = m->private;
00590         struct osd_device *dev = osd_dt_dev(dt);
00591         struct lu_target *tgt;
00592         __s64 val;
00593         int rc;
00594 
00595         LASSERT(dev != NULL);
00596         if (unlikely(dev->od_mnt == NULL))
00597                 return -EINPROGRESS;
00598 
00599         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00600         if (rc != 0)
00601                 return rc;
00602 
00603         if (dev->od_index_in_idif) {
00604                 if (val != 0)
00605                         return count;
00606 
00607                 LCONSOLE_WARN("%s: OST-index in IDIF has been enabled, "
00608                               "it cannot be reverted back.\n", osd_name(dev));
00609                 return -EPERM;
00610         }
00611 
00612         if (val == 0)
00613                 return count;
00614 
00615         rc = lu_env_init(&env, LCT_DT_THREAD);
00616         if (rc != 0)
00617                 return rc;
00618 
00619         tgt = dev->od_dt_dev.dd_lu_dev.ld_site->ls_tgt;
00620         tgt->lut_lsd.lsd_feature_rocompat |= OBD_ROCOMPAT_IDX_IN_IDIF;
00621         rc = tgt_server_data_update(&env, tgt, 1);
00622         lu_env_fini(&env);
00623         if (rc < 0)
00624                 return rc;
00625 
00626         LCONSOLE_INFO("%s: enable OST-index in IDIF successfully, "
00627                       "it cannot be reverted back.\n", osd_name(dev));
00628 
00629         dev->od_index_in_idif = 1;
00630         return count;
00631 }
00632 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(ldiskfs_osd_index_in_idif);
00633 
00634 int osd_register_proc_index_in_idif(struct osd_device *osd)
00635 {
00636         struct proc_dir_entry *proc;
00637 
00638         proc = proc_create_data("index_in_idif", 0, osd->od_proc_entry,
00639                                 &ldiskfs_osd_index_in_idif_fops,
00640                                 &osd->od_dt_dev);
00641         if (proc == NULL)
00642                 return -ENOMEM;
00643 
00644         return 0;
00645 }
00646 #endif

00649 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RO_TYPE(ldiskfs, dt_kbytestotal);

00651 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RO_TYPE(ldiskfs, dt_kbytesavail);
00652 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RO_TYPE(ldiskfs, dt_filestotal);
00653 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RO_TYPE(ldiskfs, dt_filesfree);

00695           .fops =       &ldiskfs_osd_track_declares_assert_fops         },

00698 
00699 
00700 int osd_procfs_init(struct osd_device *osd, const char *name)
00701 {
00702         struct obd_type *type;
00703         int             rc;
00704         ENTRY;
00705 
00706         if (osd->od_proc_entry)
00707                 RETURN(0);
00708 
00709         /* at the moment there is no linkage between lu_type
00710          * and obd_type, so we lookup obd_type this way */
00711         type = class_search_type(LUSTRE_OSD_LDISKFS_NAME);
00712 
00713         LASSERT(name != NULL);
00714         LASSERT(type != NULL);
00715 
00716         /* Find the type procroot and add the proc entry for this device */
00717         osd->od_proc_entry = lprocfs_register(name, type->typ_procroot,
00718                                               lprocfs_osd_obd_vars,
00719                                               &osd->od_dt_dev);
00720         if (IS_ERR(osd->od_proc_entry)) {
00721                 rc = PTR_ERR(osd->od_proc_entry);
00722                 CERROR("Error %d setting up lprocfs for %s\n",
00723                        rc, name);
00724                 osd->od_proc_entry = NULL;
00725                 GOTO(out, rc);
00726         }
00727 
00728         rc = osd_stats_init(osd);
00729 
00730         EXIT;
00731 out:
00732         if (rc)
00733                 osd_procfs_fini(osd);
00734         return rc;
00735 }
00736 
00737 int osd_procfs_fini(struct osd_device *osd)
00738 {
00739         if (osd->od_stats)
00740                 lprocfs_free_stats(&osd->od_stats);
00741 
00742         if (osd->od_proc_entry)
00743                 lprocfs_remove(&osd->od_proc_entry);
00744         RETURN(0);
00745 }
00746 #endif
